text: The Dennis Trident 2 is a double-decker chassis of a bus, It has a low floor, It was built from 1997 to 2018 by Alexander Dennis. Alexander ALX400, Plaxton President and East Lancs Lolyne/Myllennium Lolyne bodies could be built on the Trident chassis. In 2005, Alexander Dennis made a new chassis called Enviro400, it was made for the body of a bus Enviro400. The Trident 2 name was still usedBuses Magazine December 2008, Issue 645 In 2008, Alexander Dennis made a hybrid-electric powered chassis for the Alexander Dennis Enviro400H bus body. ==Gallery== File:Maghull Coaches V436DRA (8661361650).jpg|Maghull Coaches Trident 2 with East Lancs Lolyne bodywork in 2013 File:Blackpool Transport 331 PF06EZO (9128321228).jpg|Blackpool Transport Trident 2 with East Lancs Myllennium Lolyne bodywork in 2013 File:Penzance Bus Station - First 33143 (LR02LWY) (cropped).JPG|First Kernow Trident 2 with Plaxton President bodied bodywork in 2018 ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * *Product description Alexander Dennis *Product description of Enviro400 hybrid BAE Systems Trident 2 Category:Low-floor buses
title: Dennis Trident 2
